21-0_training_50_0:
SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS company_name, MIN(t.title) AS western_follow_up FROM sampled_company_name_4 AS cn,
   sampled_company_type_4 AS ct,
   sampled_keyword_4 AS k,
   sampled_movie_companies_4 AS mc,
   sampled_movie_info_4 AS mi,
   sampled_movie_keyword_4 AS mk,
   sampled_title_4 AS t
WHERE t.id = mk.movie_id
AND mk.keyword_id = k.id
AND t.id = mc.movie_id
AND mc.company_type_id = ct.id
AND mc.company_id = cn.id
AND mi.movie_id = t.id
AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id
AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id
AND cn.country_code != '[lb]'
AND (cn.name LIKE '%Television%' OR cn.name LIKE '%Radio%')
AND ct.kind = 'distributors'
AND k.keyword = 'character-name-in-title'
AND mc.note IS NULL
AND mi.info IN ('Color', 'Color', 'Color', 'Color', 'Color')
AND t.production_year BETWEEN 2005 AND 2006;

I mean, I''ve told them all to give you a break, but ...::Claire Fisher: Well this doesn''t feel like much of a fucking break... ''Kirsten'', being followed into the bathroom and lectured at by some school teacher.::Kirsten: Just go home for the day and sleep it off, okay? I won''t tell.::Claire Fisher: You won''t tell?::Kirsten: No.::Claire Fisher: Who won''t you ''tell?''::Kirsten: Human Resources.::Claire Fisher: If you wanna fucking tell...::Kirsten: Alright, I''ll tell Human Resources!::Claire Fisher: Goddammit, go! You are gonna be so fired!::Claire Fisher: Yeah, well, I''m fucking Ted.::Kirsten: ...no way.::Claire Fisher: Way.::Kirsten: Marianne and Johnny ...::Claire Fisher: Didn''t wanna hurt your feelings. Sorry.', 'Sweden:17', 'At the end of the movie, Val Kilmer says not to leave; to stay and watch the credits; and if you''re wondering who the Best Boy is, he''s someone''s nephew.
